description: Number of ways in which n can be partitioned as a sum of a square and cube.
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n=0..10000
maple: M:=100; M2:=M^2; t0:=array(0..M2);for i from 0 to M2 do t0[i]:=0; od:for a from 0 to M do for b from 0 to M doi:=a^2+b^3; if i <= M2 then t0[i]:=t0[i]+1; fi; od: od:[seq(t0[i],i=0..M2)];
author: _Felice Russo_
